data.name: AixWeather
data.description: A weather data generation tool for building energy system simulations. Pull, Transform, Export.

evidence: "AixWeather is a streamlined tool which will help you to generate weather data for building energy system simulations. The user can choose a data source and an output format, and the tool will take care of the rest. This tool is not designed as a library but as a standalone tool for generating weather data files."

"It is being developed at RWTH Aachen University, E.ON Energy Research Center, Institute for Energy Efficient Buildings and Indoor Climate (EBC) in Aachen, Germany." and "The weather tool is released by RWTH Aachen University, E.ON Energy Research Center, Institute for Energy Efficient Buildings and Indoor Climate"
"Available at PyPI as [AixWeather](https://pypi.org/project/AixWeather/)." and "Simply install via: `pip install AixWeather`"
